name: Apex Legends - Lifeline and Bloodhound Double Pack
name_original: Apex Legends - Lifeline and Bloodhound Double Pack
description: Squad up. Drop in. Prove you're the team to beat. The Lifeline & Bloodhound Double Pack includes: • Legendary Bloodhound & Lifeline Skins • Legendary Prowler & Flatline Weapon Skins • Exclusive Bloodhound Banner and Badge • Exclusive Lifeline Banner and Badge • 2,150 Apex Coins
